channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Score: Spirit, Tesla, Moderna and More Stocks That Defined the Week
item.description: Here are some of the major companies whose stocks moved on the week’s news.

item.title: Treasury yields finish mixed as spike in rates sparks buying demand
item.description: Yields on U.S. government debt closed little changed on Friday after a post-data spike in rates triggered buying demand for most Treasurys.

item.title: The S&P 500 has come to a major postelection crossroads
item.description: All-time highs were made, but not with the broad market participation you want to see.

item.title: I’m a 73-year-old retiree with a 50/50 portfolio whose bonds are doing terribly! Should I sell?
item.description: Diversification can be frustrating, but it’s still necessary.

item.title: Natural Gas Futures Rise as Heating Season Nears
item.description: Natural gas prices ended the week with a gain as the heating season approaches.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Trade Lower
item.description: Stocks fell as traders slashed expectations for a December rate cut after signals from senior Federal Reserve officials and stronger-than-expected ret...

item.title: The WSJ Dollar Index Falls 0.3% To 100.84
item.description: The WSJ Dollar Index was down 0.3% to 100.84 — snapping a five-trading-day winning streak.

item.title: Has Gold Lost Its Luster?
item.description: Gold prices rose to records leading up to the presidential election, but they’ve slumped ever since, ending today’s trading with the biggest weekly pr...

item.title: Super Micro’s looming deadline fuels fear of delisting. Here’s what that means.
item.description: Super Micro’s stock was already delisted once before, in a drawn-out process with various extensions.
